display_reuse_alerts.description: Trigger alert pop-up notifications for the user when a password reuse is detected

enterprise_domains.description: Domains where corporate passwords are approved to be entered

psk.description: Preshared key as configured on the PhishCatch server

data_expiry.description: Number of days that a hashed password is cached

ignored_domains.description: Domains which will be ignored by the extension

url_sanitization_level.description: Default level of sanitization to perform before reporting url to server

faq_link.description: Link to a FAQ explaining what phishcatch does

repo_link.description: Link to the phishcatch source code for enterprising users

enable_manual_password_entry.description: Enable the manual password entry button

username_selectors.description: Custom selectors to find usernames on a login page

username_regexes.description: Custom regexes to define the form of usernames so that passwords don't slip in
